Detailed Description

Object of picture setting used by decoder.

Field Documentation

unsigned char* alpha
int colormode

Color mode to be decoded to.

See also:
colormode_t. decode mode for 3d. 0:no 3d, 1:auto lr 3d, 2:force lr 3d,3:auto tb 3d, 4:force tb 3d.

int image_3d_lr_offset

bit 0-6 right offset from 0 to 100, bit 7 move left or right. bit 8~14 left offset from 0 to 100, bit 15 move left or right.
